OPERATIONAL DATA
Miles figures in millions 2016 2015 2014
Mainline
    Revenue passenger miles1199,014  199,467  195,651 
    Available seat miles2241,734  239,375  237,522 
    Passenger load factor382.3% 83.3% 82.4%

Regional
    Revenue passenger miles124,463  23,543  22,219 
    Available seat miles231,676  29,361  28,135 
    Passenger load factor377.2% 80.2% 79.0%
 
1 Revenue passenger mile (RPM): A basic measure of sales volume. One RPM represents one passenger flown one mile.
2 Available seat mile (ASM): A basic measure of production. One ASM represents one seat flown one mile.
3 Passenger load factor: The percentage of revenue passenger miles per available seat mile.
